content: i know the calendar may not say fall yet but starbucks released the psl for this year all my mind can think of is fall vibes and cozy accessories ok it s also thinking about handmade holiday gifts this cowl works up quick in your choice of dk/light worsted or aran directions for either weight yarn the stitch pattern works equally well with variegated and kettle dyed solids both sizes are written to be approximately 13 in diameter my sample s lengths are 13 5 in yowza and 8 5 in classy hook size i/5 5mm and a k/6 5 respectively you ll need approximately 250 yards for the aran cowl as written and 420 yards for the dk/lt worsted version changing the length and/or gauge will change your yardage requirements feel free to use any brand and colors you have on hand- my versions were part of deep stash diving i can t wait to see what you come up with approximate gauge measured over double_crochet dk/lt worsted 4 7 stitches per inch aran 3 7 stitches per inch
